fr.upem.snake.components

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upem.snake.components.Snake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Updatable

    public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, Updatable
    A snake that is allowed to move inside of a window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Snake()
      A snake that move in a direction with a speed.
